text: DJ Hollywood - the first King of Rap.  Rhythmic talking over beats.  Master of crowd response.
Run D.M.C. was the face of rap in the eighties
Beastie Boys came straight out of the New York scene in the mid-Eighties, performer their hyper raps with wit and wizardry.
N.W.A. is by their name alone, Niggas With Attitude, one of the most anti-establishment rap groups to take the mic.
2Pac was a prolific rapper whose work has inspired generations of fans and other rappers.
Dr. Dre has built a reputation has a leader in Hip-Hop, both as an artist, a producer, and a mentor.
Jay-Z is another artist who made the crossover from rapper to producer to entrepreneur.
Biggie Smalls, AKA Notorious B.I.G. and AKA Christopher Wallace, has been said to be one of the greatest rappers of all time, a legendary rival of 2Pac who died tragically over 19 years ago.
Eminem thought of his alter-ego Slim Shady while sitting on the toilet.
